typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		Name as string,
		BornYear as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Students
Students derive(AgeYears = year(currentDate()) - BornYear,
		AgeGroup = case(year(currentDate()) - BornYear> 17,'Adult','Child')) ~> AgeExtraction
AgeExtraction sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StudentOutput
